Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are casually walking along Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: On the east, you can see a gray building called "Kaldeas' Mansion of Illusion". The building is not very tall and seems mysteriously narrow. It's not a very good engineering job on the part of the architech. There doesn't appear to be a door on this side of the building. Over to the west you can see a large building that appears to span the entire city block. There is a large gem hovering about the building, radiating a purple glow as the sunlight hits it.
